content:
I’m working through The Odin Project and yesterday I completed Etch-a-Sketch project fromt the curriculum. Seeing it come alive brought me a lot more of joy than I expected.
Etch-a-Sketch on my laptop My friends have also sent me a coupel of cool drawings made with it:
(mobile devices require to click to colour, instead of hovering over the squares. So it makes it much easier to draw)
I uploaded it to github so anyone can play with it:
code: https://github.com/KiwiLata/etch-a-sketch live demo: https://kiwilata.github.io/etch-a-sketch/
title: Etch-a-Sketch
